title: Reusable isotype heterojunction g-C3N4/alginate hydrogel spheres for photocatalytic wastewater treatment
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20898-20907
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02876G, Paper

Yuito Narita, Kento Nishi, Tatsushi Matsuyama, Junichi Ida
Isotype heterojunction g-C3N4 synthesized from urea and thiourea showed high photocatalytic activity, completely decolorizing Rhodamine B in 15 min under visible light. Immobilized in an alginate hydrogel, it maintained efficiency over 10 cycles.
